about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.paragraph1: Hey there! I'm Ahmed Tamer — a Software Engineer experienced in Flutter and React ecosystems, with a solid background in building mobile and web applications. I’ve worked on ERP systems, AI chat applications, invoicing systems, and payment solutions at AppLogica.
about.paragraph2: I’m passionate about clean architecture, reusable UI design, and writing maintainable, scalable code. I love tackling complex logic and crafting well-structured solutions that connect frontend, backend, and business needs seamlessly.
about.paragraph3: Currently, I’m expanding my skill set by learning backend development using Spring Boot, exploring RESTful APIs, databases, and microservices to become a more versatile engineer.
